about_the_game: Experience a taste of OUTTA GAS, a post-apocalyptic RPG featuring turn-based SHOOTING GALLERY combat, where blasting away body tiles damages monster health and decreases their aim, dodge, and power. Play the first half of Act 1, with access to 6 weapons, 8 monsters, 2 minibosses, and much more!

content_descriptors.notes:
Cartoon gore and violence
Mild language

detailed_description: Experience a taste of OUTTA GAS, a post-apocalyptic RPG featuring turn-based SHOOTING GALLERY combat, where blasting away body tiles damages monster health and decreases their aim, dodge, and power. Play the first half of Act 1, with access to 6 weapons, 8 monsters, 2 minibosses, and much more!

name: OUTTA GAS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (particles disabled)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 (or greater) highly recommended to avoid down-scaling
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 (or greater) highly recommended to avoid down-scaling

Play the first half of Act 1, with access to 6 weapons, 8 monsters, 2 minibosses, and much more!
